item.title: We have drugs to manage HIV. So why are we spending millions looking for cures?
item.description: Over the past three decades, there have been amazing advances in treating and preventing HIV.

item.title: Diet diversity: Average Brit eats at least 49 different species a week
item.description: A major study of U.K. dietary habits has found that the food we eat contains an average of at least 49 different species each week.
